sentences.english: Panzhihua city water-saving irrigation planning I participate in is to be no exception.

sentences.english: Panzhihua city lies in the upstream of Yangtze River, where possessing of the biggest Vanadium Titanivm magnetite in China.

sentences.english: Sichuan Province armed police officers work yesterday to dismantle endangered houses in Panzhihua City.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，四川省武装部队官兵在攀枝花市拆除该市危房。
